name: Dubai City Driving Simultor 3D 2015: Expensive cars street racing by rich driver.
name_original: Dubai City Driving Simultor 3D 2015: Expensive cars street racing by rich driver.
description:
Dubai City Driving Simulator 3D is a luxury sport car simulator game. If you enjoy driving expensive cars like ferrari, bugatti, lamborghini, maserati or porsche this driving simulator is for you. You will race through the streets of Dubai City like rich owners of expensive audi, bmw or aston martin. Feel the wealth and luxury as a rich man in your sport car. While driving you will explore the streets without any traffic, fast roads, and highways of great speed. You have a great chance to practice before illegal racing.

Leave a comment WHICH CAR MODEL YOU WOULD LIKE to see in this game.
